verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> came again unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H559>say<s%> unto the <S%H5057>prince<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyrus<s%>, Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; Because your <S%H3820>heart<s%> is lifted <S%H1361>up<s%>, and you have <S%H559>said<s%>, I am a <S%H410>God<s%>, I <S%H3427>sit<s%> in the <S%H4186>seat<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, in the <S%H3820>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas<s%>; yet you are a <S%H120>man<s%>, and not <S%H410>God<s%>, though you <S%H5414>set<s%> your <S%H3820>heart<s%> as the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>:
<S%H2450>Behold<s%>, you are wiser than <S%H1840>Daniel<s%>; there is no <S%H5640>secret<s%> that they can hide from <S%H6004>you<s%>:

With your <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and with your <S%H8394>understanding<s%> you have <S%H6213>gotten<s%> you <S%H2428>riches<s%>, and have <S%H6213>gotten<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3701>silver<s%> into your <S%H214>treasures<s%>:

By your <S%H7230>great<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and by your <S%H7404>traffic<s%> have you <S%H7235>increased<s%> your <S%H2428>riches<s%>, and your <S%H3824>heart<s%> is lifted <S%H1361>up<s%> because of your <S%H2428>riches<s%>:
Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; Because you have <S%H5414>set<s%> your <S%H3820>heart<s%> as the <S%H3824>heart<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>;

<S%H935>Behold<s%>, therefore I will bring <S%H2114>strangers<s%> upon <S%H6184>you<s%>, the terrible of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>: and they shall <S%H7324>draw<s%> their <S%H2719>swords<s%> against the <S%H3308>beauty<s%> of your <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>, and they shall <S%H2490>defile<s%> your <S%H3314>brightness<s%>.

They shall bring you <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H7845>pit<s%>, and you shall <S%H4191>die<s%> the <S%H4463>deaths<s%> of them that are <S%H2491>slain<s%> in the <S%H3820>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas<s%>.

Will you <S%H559>yet<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him that <S%H2026>slays<s%> <S%H430>you<s%>, I am God? but you shall be a <S%H120>man<s%>, and no <S%H410>God<s%>, in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of him that slays <S%H2490>you<s%>.

You shall <S%H4191>die<s%> the <S%H4194>deaths<s%> of the <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H2114>strangers<s%>: for I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H5002>it<s%>, says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>.
Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, take <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H7015>lamentation<s%> upon the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyrus<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H559>him<s%>, Thus says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; You seal <S%H2856>up<s%> the <S%H8508>sum<s%>, <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>, and <S%H3632>perfect<s%> in <S%H3308>beauty<s%>.

You have been in <S%H5731>Eden<s%> the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>; every <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> was your <S%H4540>covering<s%>, the <S%H124>sardius<s%>, <S%H6357>topaz<s%>, and the <S%H3095>diamond<s%>, the <S%H8658>beryl<s%>, the <S%H7718>onyx<s%>, and the <S%H3471>jasper<s%>, the <S%H5601>sapphire<s%>, the <S%H5306>emerald<s%>, and the <S%H1304>carbuncle<s%>, and <S%H2091>gold<s%>: the <S%H4399>workmanship<s%> of your <S%H8596>tabrets<s%> and of your <S%H5345>pipes<s%> was <S%H3559>prepared<s%> in you in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that you were <S%H1254>created<s%>.

You are the <S%H4473>anointed<s%> <S%H3742>cherub<s%> that <S%H5526>covers<s%>; and I have <S%H5414>set<s%> you <S%H6944>so<s%>: you were upon the holy <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>; you have walked up and <S%H1980>down<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H68>stones<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%>.
You were <S%H8549>perfect<s%> in your <S%H1870>ways<s%> from the <S%H3117>day<s%> that you were <S%H1254>created<s%>, until <S%H5766>iniquity<s%> was found in <S%H4672>you<s%>.

By the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of your <S%H7404>merchandise<s%> they have <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of you with <S%H2555>violence<s%>, and you have <S%H2398>sinned<s%>: therefore I will cast you as <S%H2490>profane<s%> out of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>: and I will <S%H6>destroy<s%> <S%H5526>you<s%>, O covering <S%H3742>cherub<s%>, from the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H68>stones<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%>.

Your <S%H3820>heart<s%> was lifted <S%H1361>up<s%> because of your <S%H3308>beauty<s%>, you have <S%H7843>corrupted<s%> your <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> by reason <S%H5921>of<s%> your <S%H3314>brightness<s%>: I will <S%H7993>cast<s%> you to the <S%H776>ground<s%>, I will <S%H5414>lay<s%> you <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%>, that they may behold <S%H7200>you<s%>.

You have <S%H2490>defiled<s%> your <S%H4720>sanctuaries<s%> by the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of your <S%H5771>iniquities<s%>, by the <S%H5766>iniquity<s%> of your <S%H7404>traffic<s%>; therefore will I bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> from the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H398>you<s%>, it shall devour <S%H5414>you<s%>, and I will bring you to <S%H665>ashes<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of all them that behold <S%H7200>you<s%>.

All they that <S%H3045>know<s%> you among the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall be <S%H8074>astonished<s%> at <S%H1091>you<s%>: you shall be a terror, and <S%H369>never<s%> shall you be any <S%H5704>more<s%>.
Again the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,
<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H7760>set<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> against <S%H6721>Zidon<s%>, and prophesy against <S%H5012>it<s%>,

And <S%H559>say<s%>, Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; <S%H6721>Behold<s%>, I am against you, O Zidon; and I will be <S%H3513>glorified<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H3045>you<s%>: and they shall know that I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, when I shall have <S%H6213>executed<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> in <S%H6942>her<s%>, and shall be sanctified in her.

For I will <S%H7971>send<s%> into her <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>, and <S%H1818>blood<s%> into her <S%H2351>streets<s%>; and the <S%H2491>wounded<s%> shall be <S%H5307>judged<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of her by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> upon her on every <S%H5439>side<s%>; and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And there shall be no more a <S%H3992>pricking<s%> <S%H5544>brier<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, nor any <S%H3510>grieving<s%> <S%H6975>thorn<s%> of all that are round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H7590>them<s%>, that despised <S%H3045>them<s%>; and they shall know that I am the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; When I shall have <S%H6908>gathered<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from the <S%H5971>people<s%> among whom they are <S%H6327>scattered<s%>, and shall be <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> in them in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, then shall they <S%H3427>live<s%> in their <S%H127>land<s%> that I have <S%H5414>given<s%> to my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>.

And they shall <S%H3427>live<s%> <S%H983>safely<s%> in <S%H1129>it<s%>, and shall build <S%H1004>houses<s%>, and <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H3754>vineyards<s%>; <S%H3427>Yes<s%>, they shall live with <S%H983>confidence<s%>, when I have <S%H6213>executed<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> upon all those that <S%H7590>despise<s%> them round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H3045>them<s%>; and they shall know that I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%>.
